sections.title: Coastal Pirate (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Coastal Pirate class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Quick Appraise (Ex) (Coastal Pirate)
sections.description: Allows the coastal pirate to appraise the value of an item in just 1 round instead of the normal time required.

sections.title: Sodden Stealth (Ex) (Coastal Pirate)
sections.description: Grants an increasing competence bonus to Stealth checks made in marshes, bogs, or swamps, starting at +2 and scaling to +6 at 10th level.

sections.title: Bogstep (Ex) (Coastal Pirate)
sections.description: Allows normal movement through shallow bogs and reduces deep bog movement cost to 2 squares, with modified Acrobatics penalties for tumbling through bog terrain.

sections.title: Deep Breath (Ex) (Coastal Pirate)
sections.description: Extends breath holding capacity to three times Constitution score in rounds before requiring Constitution checks.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Coastal Pirate)
sections.description: Functions identically to the rogue's sneak attack ability and stacks with sneak attack damage from other sources.

sections.title: Navigate Storm (Su) (Coastal Pirate)
sections.description: Treats all storms as one category less severe for sailing and navigation purposes, reducing powerful storms to inclement weather effects.

sections.title: Grapple Ship (Su) (Coastal Pirate)
sections.description: Allows using a grappling hook to halt enemy ships through an opposed Strength check, with duration based on the margin of success.

sections.title: Shipmind (Su) (Coastal Pirate)
sections.description: Grants mental control of a ship for 1 round per level as a standard action, allowing telepathic navigation while the pirate's body becomes helpless.

sections.title: Fogcraft (Su) (Coastal Pirate)
sections.description: Creates a temporary ship made of fog that can move over land or water, with size options trading duration and stealth for capacity and durability.
